title: Scripter

embed.description: Check your Summoner statistics, MMR, realtime spectate and using powerful global LoL Charts!

body: Just played against a scripter cassiopia. I was playing Ezreal and the cassiopia was dodging every single Q, W and leona's E, R's. We would fire from FoW yet he will still stop short of the spells or move off to the side. His win rate and his champion pool give it away quite easily. We accused him of scripting constantly and he told us we were just low ELO scrubs who couldn't aim

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=mercuryblade,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=dUdqqpIf,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-07-15T11:44:37.884+0000)
>
> We accused him of scripting constantly and he told us we were just low ELO scrubs who couldn't aim

And he's probably right, LOL.
